title: Mitosis A Reckoners Story
description: From "New York Times" bestselling author Brandon SandersonÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s action-packed novel "Steelheart" comes "Mitosis," a short story set in the world of The Reckoners series, exclusively available in the digital format. Steelheart may be dead, but Epics still plague Newcago and David and the Reckoners have vowed to fight back.
